content.raw:
Are these the list of geometry types that are currently supported? The ignition::msgs::Geometry message has more geometry types. 

Side note. It might be possible to construct the contents of the combo box from the message definition. Take a look at `geometry.pb.h`. It looks like there are functions that would allow you to iterate over the enum types, and pull out string values.
content.html:
Are these the list of geometry types that are currently supported? The ignition::msgs::Geometry message has more geometry types.

Side note. It might be possible to construct the contents of the combo box from the message definition. Take a look at geometry.pb.h. It looks like there are functions that would allow you to iterate over the enum types, and pull out string values.
